lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we in sync?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, back to the matter at hand, we are sponsored tonight by Marvel Puzzle Quest. Sam, once again please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Once again, I hope people can hear. Marvel Puzzle Quest is an awesomely addictive role playing puzzle game where Marvel's fearless superheroes come to life! You can download it now on the iTunes, the Google Play, the Amazon App Store, and the Steam. And now, a rare 5-star Spider-man has arrived in Marvel Puzzle Quest just in time for Spider-man: Homecoming, the movie. You can recruit Spidey and play in two new boss missions featuring the Sinister Six. Face the Vulture, or recruit him as a supervillain for your team. Now, to celebrate the awesomeness that is Marvel Puzzle Quest, I have another one of my famous puzzles for Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right! Bring it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which of the following is an actual enemy from the game Marvel Puzzle Quest, and which is the name of an actual movie starring Jean-Claude Van Damme.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no. I am genuinely in trouble!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hitman!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, that's a DC character.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's an enemy. Brawler!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a Jean-Claude Van Damme.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Timecop!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Century Fighter!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is it, Taliesin?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know! JCVD! This is so painful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Game enemy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kickboxer!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is a Jean-Claude Van Damme.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bloodsport!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also a Jean-Claude Van Damme! And also, I think a Marvel villain, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cyborg!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a DC hero.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is also a Jean-Claude Van Damme. I'll skip a couple of these. Okay. Defender!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Actual enemy from the game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, Marvel enemy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Expendables! Double Impact!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not even going to-- yeah okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: JCVD! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The only Jean-Claude Van Damme film I've seen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. And one more for bonus. Killing Machine. That's a trick; it's a Dolph Lundgren movie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have never been so baffled in my life! That was amazing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Marvel Puzzle Quest! Marvel Puzzle Quest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Marvel Puzzle Quest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go play it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys so much. All right so, merch updates, Laura!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Okay, you guys. I gots, you know, just a few, just stuff. So, you know the David Mack poster? It looks like some people have requested, so the poster-- not the signed one! But the unsigned one is going to be for sale for a few days extra, so there's that, that's happening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, that's good news!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good news. Also good news is that some stuff is out of stock in the store, but all of it is going to the manufacturers right now, so things are getting made! So things'll be back in stock very soon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Laura, is something wrong with your head?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's still like, the shirts. Some sizes are available but some of them are out of stock, and that's all being reprinted. So you guys, it'll be back in the store very soon. Go check out the store!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was the bubbliest she's ever been over a three-month span.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm blaming the shirt, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the strawberries.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something that they recently announced in regards to the podcast. Right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, guys! Episodes 11 through 21? 21.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The other next batch of 10 should be out in a couple of weeks or so. But you can find that on iTunes and Google Play.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I listened to it on my ride today. Your ads are funny. You introduce an ep, I introduce an ep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, that's exciting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's right. I'd forgotten about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have another announcement. Travis, you want to take this one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah. We went and lost our collective damn minds for a second year in a row and at GenCon this year, we gon' be doing Critical Role live once again! It's coming back. Second year. This time it will be Friday August 18th, at the Murat Theater at Old National Center. It's going to be broadcast on both Twitch and Alpha, and we're going to have general admission seats and VIP package seats which will be the first like, few rows of the theater. You guys'll get like, a whole hour show before the actual show starts, so you'll get early admission. Brian Foster from Talks Machina will be in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) Brian Foster!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to have a whole pre-show specifically for the VIP seats. We're going to have a gift package! A special gift bag. And the tickets go on sale tomorrow morning at 10:00 am Pacific. What's PDT?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pacific Daylight Time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! That one! 10:00 AM PDT.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: PST is when we're not in daylight savings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just learned that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just did too, that was great! And a ticketing link can be found on geekandsundry.com tomorrow morning 10 AM B-- no PDT! Help me. I'm stroking out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tickets are on sale tomorrow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tickets on sale tomorrow! General admission and VIP seats! VIP seats are limited. So it's first come, first serve.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, awesome! Thank you, Travis! So excited about that, guys! So we'll see you guys at Gen Con. We have some fun stuff coming up there at San Diego Comic-Con! We announced the panel we have. That is on...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Saturday, 10:30.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's at room 3 letters. BCD?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: PDT (laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We put it out on socials, so keep an eye out for that. We'll have our schedule up here and stuff, for Comic-Con available up. So hopefully we'll see you guys there! Let's see, we have this week's Signal Boost went up with our buddy, Mischa Pollack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, Mischa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Been friends with him since high school, and he's an awesome gentleman. Extremely talented, extremely smart man, so check out his episode of Signal Boost. I like it a lot. Wednesday Club! Thank you for having me on last night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you being on our show! It was fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: New episode next week?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to be doing, in honor of the new sets that have been happening everywhere, we're doing a secret headquarters where we're going to be talking about famous superhero headquarters and everything from like, old school stuff and the League of Extraordinary Gentlemen, to the Titan's tower, all the fun stuff. It'll be cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the new series Dread went up today! Taliesin and I were players in the awesome Dread show that Ivan Van Norman runs. My mic is whack?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, your mic is whack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where'd my mic go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're working on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay! They know we're a show with a sound guy. There's no real illusion. Sound guy Chris!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chris is a Libra. His interests include underwater basket weaving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, long walks on the beach.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's an interesting tech night. Ash and I are Skyping in from the USCSS Nostromo, which is a Weyland-Yutani vessel and if we fart out it's because we've been eaten by xenomorphs. Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't hear Ashley at all. Liam is totally overpowering. I love it

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (creepy voice) Samuel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hopefully with a fixed microphone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll find out!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: We're good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (muffled dramatic music)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that you, Liam?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, Grog and Scanlan had a little excursion in the city of Vasselheim and a minor altercation with the guards, which led to a larger altercation with the guards, which led to a much larger altercation with the guards, which led to them barely escaping and deciding it's time to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can't go back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vasselheim's most wanted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see beyond the tree line and the hills that jut up from the floor the crystalline structure that seems to mark the center of the Island, and that is where we left off. What would you guys like to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you say the sand is made of pearls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be, yeah. The granules of the sand are too big to be tiny sand granules, they're about pearl-size, maybe a little bit smaller. And they're smooth, and they seem to reflect the light in a very beautiful way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to take a handful and look at them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, can we make a body scrub?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good idea, Pike. I'm going to take a good handful and put it in a pouch and save them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Microdermabrasion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're micro-plastic beads that have washed up on the shore.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to take a little bit, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you gather up some of these pearlescent beads of some kind and fill a small pouch of them and put it amongst the rest of your belongings. All righty, anything else you guys wish to do to prepare? What do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god. We're going to go see Sarenrae, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you know, like one does. Fucking jauntily walk up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (distorted) And you said that that tower was full of some sort of flame, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, robot Liam!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I wanted two cheeseburgers. What did you say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (in speak-and-spell voice) I am richer for having known you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you!  Much better!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I said (robot noises). You said that that tower had, was full of some sort of flame, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, and the, what little you can see, it seems to form this torso of a feminine structure, the body of which gives out these wings that curl upward. Held amongst the center of these wings is a large, gem-like flame. And you see within the actual crystalline-- we'll call it like a palace, if you will-- it looks like there's a light source within that flickers and dances like an eternal bonfire or flame, and it seems to have a pulse to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sure this is unnecessary, but I'm going to start thinking about setting the Death Walker's Ward to fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you guys want to take a short rest to do so?

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we need a short rest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a 20-minute thing. Well, I don't have to, if everyone else wants to start.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not in a rush, right? 20 minutes won't kill us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess. Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you take the better part of an hour, half an hour or so, 40 minutes or so, for a short rest to reset your armor to fire resist. Any other preparations?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, well hey. I'm no expert on the religious arts, but we have this eye of doom with us. Should we really be bringing this into a holy place of goodness?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think, if anything, it might be even less effective here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But what if it knows where we are and can somehow get an advantage and kill Sarenrae or something? I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should definitely ask Sarenrae about it. But it's a little late to get rid of it now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Other than your pocket dimension.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's in the Bag of Holding, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have it. I have the eyeball in the box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it still in the box? Can you shake the box and make sure there's something still in there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't open the box!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't open the box! Just shake it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it feel like there's an eyeball if you shake it? Just shake it and feel. Does it shake around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (rattling noise) It does rattle a little bit. Like a peeled wet grape, you hear it sloshing around inside.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughs) Ew.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Best Halloween trick ever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you crush the tiny granules on the ground in between your fingers, if you try really hard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you try?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I try real hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you pick one up, and you (grunts) push. Make a strength check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts and strains) No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! They're titanium pearls!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It would be good for microdermabrasion!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It really would. Wow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could I put my hand in the water? Just a (doot).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The water is gently brushing against the shore and then pulls back. There's no heavy waves. The current is this steady, almost relaxing, undulating sound. This (steady whoosh). You reach over and place your hand within, and you feel the water soak into the inside of the plates of your gauntlet. It's warm. It's probably the equivalent of a good 75, 80 degrees. It would be wonderful beach water.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Guys, it feels so nice. Should we go for just a little bit of a swim while he attunes to his--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I walk over to Pike and put my feet in the water with her, stand on the edge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, also.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I put my cold feet in, since I have no shoes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shameful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a sun? A point of light in the sky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sky is gently dappled with faint wisps of cloud and is blue and beautiful, but you do not see a particular sun in the sky. Though the light seems to be ever-present, what faint shadows you see seem to be almost from multi-directional light. There is no actual sun in the sky that you can see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The light appears ever-present. Strange.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to keep an eye out, see if there's any movement in the fields while he's attuning his armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys sit there waiting on the edge of the shoreline, keeping a watch across the waters and the edges of where the beach begins to slowly form into the rolling hills and the sparse bits of trees that you see marking the interior of the island, there's no change. It's almost like whatever pattern is here is a set pattern, or at least, any alterations or changes would be over a very prolonged period of time. You see no signs of any other life. You see no signs of any other beings walking within your immediate eyesight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it feel nice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It feels nice. It feels comfortable. It's welcoming, if a little quiet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When this rest is over, do we know what direction we're going in?

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Towards the tower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jeez, not everybody at fucking once. All right. Shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you had such good observation skills with the whole ever-present light thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man. You're always a surprise. And after so many years.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at Pike. I say, Pike, this place is beautiful. It's incredible, and I don't think we would be here if it wasn't for you and your connection to Sarenrae. And I'm honored to be here with all of you all. And to see this place with Vax. This makes me happy. Just this moment. This is nice. (sighs) I love you all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We love you, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We love you too, Keyleth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love you, Kiki.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just to be clear--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was just about to ask, was that well-thought-out speech inspirational?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so level 18 that you are, with no charisma modifier, correct? Everyone gains 18 temporary hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we all healed up and healthy now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did take a long rest. Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, we did take a long rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were some healing spells spent on Pike's end and dealing with the eye that was recovered, I think. And then you with the Plane Shift.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me and Grog got shot a few times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you got to heal a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I can use some hit dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can, during the short rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These Boots of Haste, I don't have to attune to them? They're not attunable, right? Or do I have to attune to them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, darling, they are. They're attunable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that's fine. Then I'm just going to unattune my bracers and attune my Boots of Haste that I have on. I'm going to spend the next ten minutes cleaning them up and making them look really pretty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know you're going to get them back next long rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you've attuned to the Boots of Haste.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to get so much shit online.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Broomgate 2.0. (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. It's exactly what you would do when you almost lose somebody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Keep it coming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so proud. He's as cold as his skin is right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't die anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's in character. I mean, don't give her a hard time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys finish resting. It is comfortable. It is nice here and especially, in the rush of the current state of things, this brief moment of respite feels so removed from that race, that chaos, that ever-present fear and doubt. And later you know, whether it's the surroundings or the general nature of the plane that you're in, but it's soothing. It's comforting. As you finish your attunement to the item, you finish your new attunement to your resistance, you guys gather your things, step out of the water, put your footwear back on, and what would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Walk towards the busty lady.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the marching order?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to have to fight things in this beautiful place?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ash in front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Ashley's in front. Who's next?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm with Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Grog's right up there with Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll be behind Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to trail sheepishly behind Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was about to say, I don't leave Vax's side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket is out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he is walking between-- behind me and Percy. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And as always, I'll enjoy the rear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the ravages of time and the diminishing of her influence following the Divergence are shown on some of these figures as they appear to be sheared or cracked or broken in places. But still, no sign of anything else moving on the island.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it look like people are avoiding us or does it look like this is not a place of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I had a funny feeling you would say that. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see no signs of any movement, any foot tracks. No signs of anything in the vicinity that would lead you to believe that you're being avoided or being watched.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it look like anyone has been here for a very long time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a one. I have no idea what's going in this fucking place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you lead on. You make your way through these tangled paths and they shift and curve and turn and the light never seems to change overhead and as you hike along and chat amongst yourselves and keep open to the vicinity around you and you're breathing in the clean air with hints of seaspray and saltiness that eventually makes its way through the breeze. You can feel parts of you sweat beneath your armor, from the general warmth of the atmosphere, and you travel for about an hour. Pike, and Vex and Vax and Keyleth, you pick up on this, too. The crystalline structure in the center of the island doesn't appear to be any closer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Didn't we go through something like this before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We literally went through this before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We had really think about being there, is that what we had to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Pike, do you think you need to talk to her somehow? Or call to her somehow?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Okay, I'm going to pull out the key again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The metallic loop. The curved piece of metal. Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) There is no spoon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sarenrae, we have travelled very far and we are here and if you could give us any guidance to get closer to you I would be forever grateful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You say this out loud?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You look out before you, still staring at the crystal structure. No response.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I repeat that again in my head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you say it back to yourself in your head?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ticking them off, one at a time. Here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you look forward at the crystalline structure, looking at its form, and focus on those words on the inside of your head. No response.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we have to let her know we're here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pikey-poo. Pikey-pants. You had a religious thing and talked to your god, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Say again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You talked to Sarenrae briefly, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did she invite you or all of us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. Is this a thing where you think you're invited to a party, so you bring your whole crew and then maybe realize they weren't invited?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to walk solo for ten minutes and see if you are, solo, getting any closer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll keep you in ear contact.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this like party hopping at Comic Con?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Get us on the list. Once you're in there, then we'll join you in line.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See how many wristbands you can get.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'll keep walking and I'll keep looking back, thumbs up, and I'll see what I can find.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You walk forward and you can look back at your friends and you continue to walk forward towards the structure. You eventually begin to weave between these stone obelisks, which get dense and overlap to the point where maybe about a hundred feet ahead, you lose sight of Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to get on my broom and fly up in the air and see if I can see her from the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You fly up in the air and you look down and you see her. She's right beyond where you lost sight of her originally, and she's walking forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay. How you doing, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good, good. Just traveling over these stone structures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you watch. Pike, you walk for another ten minutes or so on your own, and you watch her travel, and as you focus, she's travelling, but she's still the same distance from everyone else she was when she left. She went just beyond eyeline and then it's weird. Like it doesn't make sense. You watched her maneuver and change and shift around things, yet she hasn't gotten any further or any closer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So is it like a side-scrolling background?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In a way, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? And I turn around and the ocean is still where it was, behind us? Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does it look like I've gotten far? I feel like I've gone real far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you're in the same place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a weird theory.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the terrain repeating itself? What was your theory?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe this is vision-based. Maybe we have to close our eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did we do this before?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like this. Let's walk with our eyes closed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we just have to think really hard about being at the tower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I close my eyes and I start walking straight ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) As Grog closes his eyes and starts walking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I close my eyes and think really hard about being directly in front of the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Anybody else want to do anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start walking the opposite direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eyes closed or open?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Away from the tower, with my eyes open.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I stand confused and watch Kiki leave us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth turns away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I spin three times in a circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to stand there and think about being closer to the tower with my eyes closed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You all begin to close your eyes and begin walking and start wandering in different directions and bumping into pieces of stonework.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bunch of cockroaches when you turn on the light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you close your eyes for a moment and concentrate, and your vision is dark. You don't see the world around you, but within a few seconds of embracing this darkness, a sudden burst of light appears ahead of you, and you see a burning beacon visible in the direction where the crystal palace was before you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I'll try keeping my eyes closed and start walking towards it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys are figuring yourself out, and you are concentrating so hard on being there--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn around. Is the tower any closer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it further?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit. I walk back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You join the rest of the group and you watch half your party still stumbling into pieces of stone. Pike, you with your eyes closed, still seeing this burning beacon, this circular sphere wreathed in flame that just licks up as the flames slowly burn out of the bottom of this structure and flicker off into nothing. You step for about two minutes or so in its direction, and the heat gets warmer and warmer and warmer, and then you open your eyes for a moment and you're right in front of it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, guys, can you see me?

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Can we hear her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can hear her, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. I open my eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look down and she's right in front of the crystal structure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She got all the fucking way there? What did you do, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just thought about it. I closed my eyes and I started walking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I fucking did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I did, too. Ow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Open your eyes, Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I walked the other way, and it definitely didn't work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is she doing that we're not doing? Her hair is partially blue. Maybe we should dye our hair blue, as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe you can only get here if you're a believer of Sarenrae.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I'm a believer. Can I try?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) I'm a believer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You close your eyes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to clutch my symbol of Sarenrae and I'm going to close my eyes and I'm going to see if anything happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sit there in silence for about a minute and a half as the darkness is there before you, pitch black. And you're clutching the symbol as hard as you can with your fingers, to the point where it's almost hurting your hand, and you see the faintest distant flicker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go towards it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch Scanlan, eyes closed, begin walking towards the crystalline structure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's working for him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to follow him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to follow him. I'm not going to aim for the tower, I'm going to try to get to Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're going straight for Pike?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And you're following Scanlan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Just nonchalantly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vax? Keyleth? Grog?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do we do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not going anywhere.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm confused. I want to see what happens to those two when they follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How is it working? What are you guys doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're believers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe you guys have to believe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I think that the existence of a pantheon of gods is a well-established fact in our world, so I believe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So poetic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have to believe deeper than that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think, perhaps, you need reverence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see things rushing past you, but there's some disconnect, that as soon as you begin to change focus, you're right where you were. Grog and Scanlan. Scanlan, you step forward, and that beacon becomes brighter and warmer, and you feel the warmth and you open your eyes, and you're there next to Pike, in front of the palace. And Grog, you walked alongside Scanlan, and you walked as he watched and you went past the brush and suddenly, you're at the palace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm there?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Sorry, not Grog. Percy was. You stayed back. I misremembered.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab Keyleth's hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival. That's my fault. So Percival, you made it past the boundary with Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did you-- how did-- Shit. We should have followed Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is bullshit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe in plenty of things. But, yeah, no, I agree. This is bullshit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to close my eyes and be like, Sarenrae, I really believe in you. You're so holy, and very divine and beautiful, and I think you do really good things for Pike, and I'm very happy about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You concentrate. A minute. Two minutes. Five minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck. This is not working!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pike. Pike, do you want to collect the rest of them and lead them back here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I scoop up Keyleth's hands and I say, you trust me, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, you know that good feeling that you have when you hang out with Pike? You know that warm feeling you have. Toasting marshmallows with her around the fire, that kind of feeling?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know that comes from Sarenrae, so focus on that with me. And we'll go to Pike. Focus on Sarenrae and that marshmallow feeling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But that comes from Pike, not from Sarenrae.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know that's partially true, but not all true. Come on, give it a shot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I try really hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Think about the marshmallowy goodness that is Sarenrae.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vax and Keyleth do this. And then what do you do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Close our eyes and show reverence to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Another five, six minutes of darkness passes. Your eyes are closed. No beacon. Nothing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. How long will it take me to walk back to them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you walk back to them?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to walk back to them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. A minute. You emerge from the brush, and you walk and see Keyleth and Vax, eyes closed, clutching hands, just hoping. And Grog, looking bored as hell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Where's Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm up here, dear.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Come here. I have an idea. Okay? So everybody, hold onto me somehow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold hands? Like preschool?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a train?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Just don't let go. And I'm going to think real hard, and maybe we'll all be there together.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. We have to walk, though, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eyes closed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I'm not closing my eyes. I'm just holding onto Pike's hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still thinking about marshmallows, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thinking about bacon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab Pike by the earlobe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That tickles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Pike, do you close your eyes and follow that beacon once more?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys walk alongside, focusing on Pike and her leading this small pack of friends along through the heavily rolling hills and the pieces of stone obstruction that force you to make your way around. You help guide her around these various obstructions that get in the way. Pike, you're concentrating on this burning beacon of warmth ahead of you. And within three minutes of travel, it seemed almost closer than when you saw her disappear before. You guys look at her, and glance up and you've just come across the threshold of the stones, and you're now in this open sandy patch at the base of this large crystal structure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice! Good job, Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pikey-poo.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Look at this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So now standing-- (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) It's beautiful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's so much more beautiful up close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's at that point that you see something in the flame begin to take shape. You watch as this dark outline begins to open up as two large wings unfurl from within, revealing feathers of ivory and pearl, like the beach you arrived on, as this 15-foot-tall feminine vision of Sarenrae emerges from the roaring pyre, long curling flames burn as her hair from her beautiful dark skin framing a warm and motherly smile, her eyes gold and brown like the most polished brass. Her robes of light blue unfurl in endless strands that almost seem to tether her to the inferno behind her, and as she emerges from the flame, you can't help but find yourself stunned and awed at the presence. Her standing there unsinged from the flames, slowly descends, still floating above you, her arms out, her wings and hair unfurled, almost like a canopy above the group as you look up at her. Her face turns and smiles onto small Pike on the ground, and you hear her voice for the first time for all of you, but not the first for Pike, who has heard her voice for a very long time. "My Pike, you come "to me after all this time. Such a beacon in a very dark world. Welcome."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take a knee. Thank you for letting us come here. It's just such an honor to be in your presence and to meet you in person. I've been a believer of yours for my whole life, and to actually be here in front of you is very humbling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She descends faintly. Her massive form slowly seems to-- not shrink, but shift perspective a bit, where once she was this massive entity before you, seems almost human in size as the hand comes down and reaches and touches the top of Pike's forehead and just runs down the nose, onto her chin. And you see the brow furrow a bit as she says, "You vanished from my sight. You walk paths "cast in shadow. My sands whisper thoughts of sorrow and foreboding. I must know from you all, "what dark tidings bring you before me harboring such emotion?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I think last time we spoke, we took on a battle that we were not able to complete and we need your help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What type of foe do you face?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know Vecna?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks to you a bit. There's a faint bit of recognition. "This entity, this Vecna, is "clouded, even in history. I know little myself, and with my sands, they know little of this undying "king. I imagine by his own design."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He deals in secrets. It's kind of his thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What can you tell me?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a piece of him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Maybe. Well, we can tell you that he is awful, evil, pure evil incarnate, and he wants to be a god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He has eyes on your territory.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He is something of a demigod now, you could say, and well on his path to ascension.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ascension?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He wants to be like you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or I guess he wants to be like the Raven Queen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ascension? The Raven Queen, you say?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He could tell you more, but I know she was a mortal who rose to her godhood, and I know he's looking for a similar path.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Impossible."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've seen it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's been working on it for a very long time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And obviously hungry for power.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her vision, her eyes seem to drift from you and look out past the glass and crystal to the distant shores beyond as she speaks out, exclaiming the thoughts as they come across her mind. Sarenrae says, "The Ritual of Seeding is one of the Matron of Raven's design. It is the secret rite that "rebirthed her from her mortal trials and granted her the powers to take her place among the Prime "Gods and become custodian to the realms between life and death, fate and the cold of winter. But "this ritual was summarily cast from all knowledge and sealed, intent for eternity, by all who walk "the paths of divinity. None should know this. None should know this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the goddess Ioun? The goddess of knowledge? Would she have known?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She was the one who spearheaded its destruction."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vecna's been taking over her chapels? Temples?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know not where Ioun is. She is hidden away. The Dawnfather would know more than I. They "were together when she was wounded. If this ritual has come into the hands of another mortal, where "is this mortal now?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have his eye in a box. It's powerful and intelligent.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take out the box.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's slowly staked out on the Prime Material plane. Just north of Vasselheim, about 350 miles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Recently completed a ritual in the Shadowfell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If he's finished the seed, he's already on his way."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does that mean? How can we stop him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The ritual takes some time, from what I recall. I don't know how long. I was not its "architect. I was not the one who sealed it. Ioun would be the one to ask. However, if this is "completed, then the Accord of the Divergence is in danger. If we will have one god on one side of the "Divine Gate and the others on the other, we could not stop him. Understand, in order for any of us "to directly interfere to seal a god like we did once long ago, we would have to tear down the "Divine Gate and that would release an entirely new armageddon upon your world. So either you stop him "and seal him, or you live amongst the only god we cannot stop."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we seal away a god?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I was betrayed during the Calamity. I was not present when they began to "seal the Betrayer Gods. You'd do best to speak with maybe some of the others who were more "prominent in that time. You walk in Elysium. This is the realm also of Pelor."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Dawnfather?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Might I ask, does Kord reside in Elysium?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, but you could perhaps speak with him, too. I don't know much about Kord. We don't see "eye to eye." And if you could see a goddess glance sidelong with embarrassment, this is the closest you'd ever see. "I've fallen from import over recent years, until recently."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks down at Pike for a minute. "Until recently." And turns back to Scanlan and says, "And don't think your prayers have gone unheard, as well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Apologies, but you heard me at night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When your heart was true to it, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. You won't tell anybody, will you? Because some of that is personal stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She smiles and averts her gaze from you. "Do you know if this mortal, this man, this Vecna, do "you know in your heart of hearts, Pike, that this man is beyond redemption? Is there any spark of "hope in his heart to turn him back to the light?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I would always hope that in somebody, but at least the time spent with him that we have, it doesn't seem that that's his path.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I trust in your insight, and this is your judgment to make. The greatest judgment you "may ever make. As you walk this path, closer to conflict with this entity, search yourself for any "glimmer, and if there is no redemption to be had, then smite him with all the might I have granted "you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not doing a lot of talking to us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A lot of killing, disintegrating.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How will we know if he's a god or not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You'll know. We all will know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it hasn't happened yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not yet."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long do these seeding rituals usually take? How much time do we have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. You would have to ask those who were responsible for sealing it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dawnfather.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so confused. That's it? We didn't walk away from him unscathed the first time, and we're just supposed to try again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Even in the dark days of the Calamity, the might of our weapons could only diminish the "betrayers who rose against creation. The two that orchestrated our victory and designed the means of "sealing away such terrible evil, I've already mentioned. They would be of more aid than I. The "Knowing Mistress Ioun, as wounded and hidden away as she is, and the Dawnfather, warden to the "Chained Oblivion. His fortress across the fields of Elysium. I could send you there."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be quite helpful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was hard getting here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will he be as accepting as you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I haven't spoken much with the others in some time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get to know them again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my goodness! What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get a plus-two bonus to your constitution.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll take a picture and text it to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But once this ability is used, you can't use it for another seven days.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Man, I love her so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you want to take a picture and send that to her. Here we go. Hold onto that and give it to her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Sarenrae gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Sarenrae is still there, just the flames have burned away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to send this to you, Ashley.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm right here, guys. It's really not cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Since Sarenrae is still standing there, I want to say to her-- shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good start.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit, sorry. I want to apologize. This feels so stupid. I want to apologize for never realizing what you are and what this could be and for not showing you the reverence that you deserve. And I hope to change that in the future, and I will certainly think differently from here on out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look down and look up, where once she was this large entity above you, you look down and look up, and she's right before you. "No apologies necessary. The creation of Exandria, the peoples "that populate it and develop and design, innovate and worship, was with free will to make your own "path. Faith is important to some, but the intent was to instill you with the means of doing and "choosing whatever and however you like. We do not wish reverence of all. Just those who find us. At "least, I speak for myself."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I think you're pretty wonderful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is balance to everything."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I took these from your beach. It doesn't seem right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes the pouch from you and pours it out, and as the pearls are about to land, they drift off and dart off back to the location where you originally found them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Same. I just thought I wanted to take a little piece with me, but I already have that. I didn't know what it was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you empty the pearls, they also dart off towards the beach where you first landed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just thought they were really pretty.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would have told you before we left, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's all right. But for everything great that we may have created, you continue to create "far better. Our existence brings threat. We've brought two calamities before. We try and avoid a "third. Whether we diminish in time or just maintain this balance, it's you, and your "children, and your children's children, that hold the keys to the future of your lives, your people, "your culture, and us. So don't apologize."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you say Sarenrae's attractive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you asking her, or is this a question to me as the DM?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's beautiful. I wouldn't put it in terms of any sort of a sexual object.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's just beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's just an incredibly beautiful, powerful, feminine form. And, to the extent where Grog, who usually being a man who's driven by base needs, not a single thought comes across you in any base or defacing way, it is too powerful. It overwhelms it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, she's beautiful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are titties?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What even are titties?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do titties?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm keeping my little pearl from the beach.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) That you've been trying to crush?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Terrible. Matt's like, shady shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to need one, y'all gave yours back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be like the Wonka factory, it's just it's going to turn on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stole fizzy lifting drinks. You now have to be watched.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pearls from the beach, you get nothing, sir! Good day!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Good day, sir!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. "You have my blessing, Pike. Do this for me, do this for them, do this for you. Do this "for all of creation. And do it soon. The longer you wait, well, the longer you wait. Do you wish "to be off to the Dawnfather?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, time is of the essence. We should go right away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he as warm and welcoming and nice as you are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's a good answer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a bright white flash emanating from her torso and arms, your vision just goes white and you all blink for a moment as your head spins for but a brief instant. Your feet touch hard ground and you all immediately reach up and rub your eyes, and as your vision slowly coalesces once more, you find yourself standing in the deep center of some vast orchard, surrounded by an endless sea of fruit-bearing trees of all sizes, shapes and colors, intertwined, the canopy broken and sparse in places where you can see above a clear, blue, cloudless sky. You're no longer on the Island of Renewal, that's for sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought, but isn't that where the Dawnfather is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Island of Renewal is where Sarenrae is. The blessed fields of Elysium is the plane. He existed elsewhere in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I understand now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there the same ever-light sky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ever-present, sorry. Ever-presence in light. I use my druidic die. 29. Sorry, 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to see from down low, because the canopy does choke it a bit, you can see bits of the sky that appear blue, cloudless, whereas you saw wisps of cloud over the island, this appears clear, you can climb up a bit and try to get a better look if you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you begin to leap up through the branches, and a lot of the trees here have winding and knotted branches, so it's pretty easy to find your way up the canopy after maybe a five minute climb. You get up and peek over and you can see now this orchard goes on for miles and miles, and miles, filling this vast valley that you can barely see mountains that crest the edge of it in the distance near the horizon. You also see there is no cloud in the sky, and there is no sun, but there is a single pillar of light that streaks down from way way up, the zenith striking down in the center of this orchard, where there you see before you this awe-inspiring sight of the Dawnfather's home: a gold-plated citadel of many humongous towers and spires that both resembles a military fortress and the largest-steepled church you've ever seen. It's hard to gauge distance with so many trees between you and it, you don't know if it's miles off from you, if it's maybe a thousand feet or so, but even at this distance, it's incredible in its scale.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Hey, guys, Pelor's not messing around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They make really tall things here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think this is like Sarenrae, where we can't get to him unless we have him in our heart?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I feel a little bit more connected here. This I can-- it's trees. I'm surrounded by trees. This I can relate to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I've tried to talk to Pelor before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've talked to the Sun Tree. (gasps) I wonder if the Sun Tree is here? Maybe he's got a twin here like you have a twin!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I recognize any of the fruit that's growing on the trees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. 15.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Decent for a city boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's interesting. This orchard-- various fruits thrive in various climates. As you begin to walk a little bit through, it is a peppering of all sorts of trees and fruits. You see apples of all shades, you see oranges, you see rare passion fruits, you see floral-based growing fruit. It's a perpetual harvest here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rush down and say, don't eat the fruit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Might be souls?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it might be souls!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's fruit! Souls don't grow on trees.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Souls also don't wash up on beaches, but apparently they do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That may be the most interesting thing I think you've ever said, is souls don't grow on trees.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Souls don't grow on trees!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At least he knows the dangers of monocultures. This is very impressive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, this is, there's a lot of variety.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What're you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is off on his own, by the way, sitting on his ass having a moment, because it wasn't too long ago when he had a thing for Sarenrae, and that was pretty bittersweet so he's staring off into space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One piece of fruit? One piece, just one little piece. An apple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're in Elysium! Oh my god, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you do eat anything, and you shouldn't, but if you do eat anything, eat something you don't recognize, it'll be funnier that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any fruit that I don't recognize?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (deadpan) No, don't, stop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Something I don't recognize. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, actually, you guys walk for about three or four minutes in the direction of where you saw the fortress, and you come across what looks to be a small bush that's clustered near this dark wooden tree with a thick, gnarled exterior, and this bush has these small ripe plum-like fruits that come to a point at the bottom that you've never seen before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, do not. Do not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Pick this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't! (gasps)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) Grog!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I dare you not to eat it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't say that. He'll do it! You know that's what happens!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, why don't we say, are you a person?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispers) Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing? Nothing. You want to check it for magic?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to check it. Hello, are you a soul?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I'm a soul.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh my god, it is a soul! It just spoke to me. Oh my god. What's your favourite color?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Blue, like your feather.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It said blue, like my feather! Did you hear it? It was talking, Grog. It was talking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Don't eat it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?! (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just in case!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do I do with it? I already picked it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have an idea! Why don't you hold onto it. Keep it in your pouch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not in the Bag of Holding, keep it in your shirt pocket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When have I ever worn a shirt?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You can ask him if the fruit is edible, and make sure it's not people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's fair. All right. I will hold onto the pointy plum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we getting any closer to the citadel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys keep walking towards it?

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you walk on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any people? Does it look like there's tracks in this orchard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, Vax, Vex, and Keyleth, you notice fairly quickly in that you begin to see movement ahead. The air itself, which by the way, the wind here is carrying a very sweet and fragrant, almost like honey flower whiffs that come through in waves that hit you, the whole atmosphere here makes you hungry, it makes you comfortable, it reminds you of childhood in a strange way. It's a very good, positive atmosphere. You begin to see as you approach, figures, moving. Pike, you recognize this because these are similar to the vision you just had from Sarenrae. They are entities. They are souls. They are people that walk the fields of Elysium, and you see them walk with small satchels, and you see them picking the fruit. And gathering, and harvesting. They don't seem to pay you too much mind, and as you begin to get close to some of them, they just stop and watch you. It's very Spirited Away, in a strange way. You see these somewhat translucent entities that barely acknowledge your existence and then as you pass by, they go on to whatever work they were doing. No speech, you don't even see eyes or faces, you just see the outline of the human-like shape, various heights and sizes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But they're picking the solid fruit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're picking the solid fruit, and gathering them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they eating the solid fruit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see any of them immediately eating it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: None of them are eating the fruit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a feeling it's an offering.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a feeling it's fucking fruit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we getting closer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You continue to walk and make sure to avoid some of the larger clusters of these various harvesting entities, these harvest souls. You, who's leading the charge this time, who's leading you through the orchards?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of you two. Is this technically favored terrain for you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would count as a forest for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah? I guess I'll be in the front. Percy, have you done a lot of talking to Pelor?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not really, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, how do you feel about gods these days? Last time we talked we were both not optimistic, I feel like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know how to be polite. I'm very reasonable at that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Reverence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Reverence.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can certainly acknowledge when someone can squash you like a bug.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But a lot of things can squish us like bugs. I don't know, this is complicated. Let's just keep going. I'm going to keep an eye out while we're walking, for anything that resembles the Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. Are you leading the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you have no sun to keep tabs on, you're just going to have to fly up above the canopy and keep an eye on it, so you're cresting and descending through the orchard as you progress. You travel for about an hour and a half to two hours, and you notice you are getting closer, but it is a long way away, you probably have another three, four hours of travel before you get there on foot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a long trek. We've got a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder if we believe harder if we'll get there quicker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't believe that'll work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let's just go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just keep on pushing on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? We don't have anything that'll make us move faster?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we have misty, but that seems--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That seems stupid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a nice walk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It dwarfs your size by comparison to where you really get a sense of scale of how small you may be in this realm versus some of the creatures that call it home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If it fell on me, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if its apple grew as big as the actual tree. If it fell, you'd be doomed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you progress, a few more hours into this trek, eventually, Vex, you begin to notice the light ahead begins to grow brighter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, I think we're getting closer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does this feel like sunlight? Does it register like sunlight or is it a whiter light?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like should we put some sunblock on as we walk towards it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah? Is it sunlight temperature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It registers as a sunlight. It is a pure light.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like kitchen light white or like reading room light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like noon daylight light.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Arizona or California?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there in the center of the structure is one thick, massive tower that crawls upward and upward and upward and upward for, even at this point, surmising 15, 20 stories before the tip vanishes into the bright light that is descending from the sky above. You see the outline of a few sparse trees that catch your attention. You do see some trees that litter this open space within this bright light that are of the same type of tree as the Sun Tree that resides in the center of Whitestone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He does have a twin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think this tower is compensating for something, or maybe it's a representation. Hard to tell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Basically we'll know Vecna's a god if another skyscraper forms in Elysium somewhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How close are we to the column of light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're stepping beyond the treeline and into the light, so you're just at the edge of the tree line.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I Druidcraft a little twig and hold it into the light column.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Doesn't seem to affect it at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing? I'm going to touch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's warm. It's like warm daylight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we're not going to die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I'm going to look at the citadel with my eyes wide open for five seconds, and then close my eyes really fast to see if I can see better details of it like when you look at the sun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You do, actually!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I swat my sister in the forehead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, I'm doing stuff here; it's science.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In closing your eyes, yeah, you can see the shape and the outline of the spires that go off, and you can see the plating and the large, heavy structures. And you can see the various windows that dot the outside on multiple levels. It looks like there's at least seven or eight different levels of the actual fortress. You see lines of windows and looks to be balconies that adorn it at these different stages. And at the top of that, the towers go higher and higher. It's almost like a city of a fortress in its own right in its scale. It's impressive. It's like if you took part of the City of Brass and jammed it into one structure and made it pure gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pure gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's gorgeous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is beautiful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) But it does burn the shit out of your eyes if you stare at it that long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like him a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Someone should go in and test out the light.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's just go in. It's just light.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe the light will take us there, straight to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I push Vax in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I jump in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push Vax in? All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, warm again! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very warm. And with your dark leather it's like the goth kid in summer. Little sweaty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was never the goth kid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can only surmise maybe the smallest one being 20 feet in diameter and going up from there on the scale on the central portions of it. And what's interesting is, usually with stained glass the bright exterior, the color is darkened and shaded because the light is once you're inside the structure, but the color is so vibrant in the stained glass, you get the sense that there is a light source within the actual fortress that is as bright if not brighter than the column of light that is descending from the sky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should've worn sunglasses here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to get closer and closer to the citadel, once again the scale seems to build and build. What should seem to be a shorter walk gets longer and longer as you begin to see how massive and far away this is, compared to where you thought it was. And about 30 minutes since you left the treeline, you begin to just get past the final bit of Sun Trees that are planted around the exterior.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I touch a few as I walk by. See if I feel anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're alive, they're vibrant and similar in texture as to the one you've spoken with in Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You going to try talking to them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know this tree?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. Maybe he's like a distant relative of the Sun Tree. Maybe I know him by proxy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe they're like, oh yeah, Sun Tree I remember him, he got taken away as a seedling, but he was really great. How's he doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, you know you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's an Elysium tree, just saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's possible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a once in a lifetime opportunity, Kiki.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll try and speak to one of the Sun Trees that looks the most friendly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Amicable tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check. See which one seems the most approachable of all the other trees.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Weigh the nuts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural one. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see one tree that looks definitely the most amiable of the ones in the field and you approach it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Amiable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Amicable. Pick your term.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Amicable, amiable. All right, I'll talk to a tree. That's what I'm going to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you finish your spell and reach out, your finger touching the warm exterior of the tree. The light's still a little blinding, but you've adjusted to it now, where you can make out shapes and color, as opposed to the blaring white. What do you say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Sun Tree bro. Are you a Sun Tree bro? Are you a Sun Tree brother? What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm a tree of the sun. And I'm not your bro."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I didn't know if you knew the Sun Tree that grew in Whitestone on the Prime Material Plane. I didn't know if you knew him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So because I'm a tree of the sun, you assume that I know all other trees of the sun. Is "that what this is? It's one of those things? We all look alike, don't we? Just all of us trees of "the sun, right?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you tell me a little about this plane? How do we talk to Pelor? How do we see him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's probably a good place to look, where all the light's coming from."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Yeah. Wow. I have a friend who wants to know about the fruit. He's wondering if the fruit is souls? If he can eat the fruit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The fruit is not souls! It's fruit."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vindication!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good luck. Sorry if I came off a bit brusque. It's "been a long time since anyone's talked to me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to offend you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apology accepted."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would you like a hug?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. I would most definitely not like a hug."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Absolutely. Thank you. All right, bye. Okay, bye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good day."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were waiting the whole time to use that, weren't you? The whole conversation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just sitting, like knitting, crochet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you rolled that one, I was like okay, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's more ornery than anything. (laughs) All right, as Keyleth returns from her conversation with the tree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't seem as blissed out as you normally do. Did it go okay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it was fine. Just can't talk to everybody, I guess. It's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you ask him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing. Just asked if he knew the Sun Tree, and he got super offended. You know what? Let's just go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've never been rejected by a tree before, have you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Most trees like me. People don't like me, but at least trees do, except for this asshole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start to smooth out her mantle, which is wiring up like a cat's.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My leaves are prickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he was just pretending he didn't like you because he felt uncomfortable because he likes you so much. Like Kash!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's nice, Vex. Thanks. You didn't talk to this guy, okay? You don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you ask about the fruit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he said it's fruit. It's fine. You can eat it, too. You're right, Grog. You were right! Eat the fruit! Let's go! Come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yikes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Breathe in, breathe out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys begin making your trek back towards the Fortress of the Sun. As you're walking--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rip off an apple as I go, and I start aggressively eating it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Sun Trees here don't bear fruit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I fucking spike an apple that I had earlier!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. If you have an apple with you, you're welcome to eat it if you wanted to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! I just want to go in the tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lean over to Percival and say, this is one of those times when it's best just to keep quiet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so quietly delighted by this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (wingbeat, whoosh) Glide and then flying in your direction rather rapidly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope they're friendly. He's definitely not as solitary as Sarenrae, is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Similar, but not as well adorned as the armor that Pike wears. Holding spears, various other weapons or shields, but as they fly in and land, (impact noise) landing. They all stand about five or six feet taller than all of you. Humanoid, muscular, almost Roman in physique, but their skin is a very faint light blue. Their eyes are white.

lines.name: LAURA
