lines.text: Hunin and Kyor!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are they devas? Celestials? Angels!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Celestials.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have similar traits, though apparently purer and much stronger than the half-blood celestials that you had met previously in the City of Brass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That we rescued. Didn't just meet them. We saved them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, and you gave them a new life under the remaining family of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hunin and Kyor. I even got their fucking names right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, which is awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The third time, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is your business here?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy, do you want to flash a little Whitestone bling, at the moment?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're pretty Whitestone blinged.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're Vox Machina. We were sent here to speak to Pelor by the goddess Sarenrae.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sarenrae sent you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, she did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "With what business?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To speak about a very big evil growing on the Material Plane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Okay. 22?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, almost a sneer for a moment. And then to Vax and Vex. And then to Pike, a nod.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, a nod.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks back to the first guard, and says, "There is no evil among them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hear that, Grog? You're not evil.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I knew that. Why didn't you just ask?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do, it should be noted, carry a dangerous artifact that we should warn you of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Check in our weapons. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one soldier that you were first speaking to steps forward, his heavy footfalls from his armored boots. He puts his hand out. "We will take this artifact."

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: (hesitant noises) Will we get it back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What need do you have with a dangerous artifact?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it belongs to the great evil, and so it's possible that we can use it to defeat him, so if we don't have it, we might not be able to do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It may give us an advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could be really great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Dawnfather will be the judge of that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm all right with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't look at it, though. It'll turn you super evil, and you'll rip out your eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Noted." Such a big thing, and yet you shook it a little, strangely. "Very well. Follow us, "please."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How's that fruit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their wings fold behind them, and they walk alongside you, matching their gait to yours. As you move forward, even with your brisk pace, their gait is so long that they're having to make long, slow strides to keep up with your slow pace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hold Percy's hand as we're going in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we'll do this together. I'm all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the mass army that's been approaching you, you can see now, are hundreds of armored spirits, similar to those that you saw in the orchard. As they approach, the three planar entities that are walking alongside you put their hand up in a dismissive motion, and the army parts, leaving a singular path that leads you right to the front of the fortress. And the path, because there's so many, goes on. It's like walking through a parade of silence. As you all look around, you can't make out any faces. You see hundreds of sets of glittering golden armor with the somewhat-visible form of these translucent spiritual entities that take up the space. You don't sense any hostility, animosity. You don't sense any welcoming. You don't sense anything from them. They're present and letting you pass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the armor solid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you prepare yourselves to adjust your gaze, you ascend step by step to eventually take in whatever the interior of the Fortress of the Sun has to offer. And that's where we're going to take our break! We're going to return back here in a few minutes. We're going to use the restroom and get snacks and stuff. You guys can rest here for a minute. We have a giveaway.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Fruit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't eat the spiky bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. Make a wisdom saving throw real fast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, just Grog, because he's an idiot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Okay, good to know. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe it's super fruit. Maybe it's acai berries.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, one more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nnailhammer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it Nine Inch Nail hammer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also notice as you walk in, there's no shadow or shade. The walls seem to almost emanate light on their own.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I beg to differ.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The outside's a different story.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go to the courtyard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just you wait!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No shadow underneath us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear this soft music played, the deeper into the fortress you get.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Club's over here, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Benny Hill music commences.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At that point, the doors (scraping noise) open, and you wince once again, as the light that fills the room from the inside is near-blinding. You close your eyes a bit, and all you hear is this deep, resonant voice say, "Come."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This has to be Heaven. The doors just keep opening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This must be the bright light that everyone sees when they die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't steal his doors, or anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to steal the doors?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What a terrible thing to say in the presence of the Dawnfather.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (muffled) All right, one foot in front of the other. Here we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we can't hear Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "One foot in front of the other. Here we go," I said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance up, and you see the interior of that giant steeple-like tower that's sat at the center of the fortress in the distance, and you look up almost endlessly. You can see floor after floor with an endless spiral of various stained glass structures and reliefs and small statues that protrude from the edges, and this tower is seemingly hollow, just leading up, and you can't even make out the top of it from this distance. It looks like a tower that is infinite, almost, from this perspective, it's so big.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the light coming from the tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step into the chamber, the door (boom) closes behind you, and the winged planar entities that pushed you in are not in the chamber. It's just you... and the Dawnfather.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From throwing shit at people...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't you do that just last week?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did. I do that most weeks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Next time we visit the Dawnfather, wear some underwear. This floor is like a mirror.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I don't ever-- oh, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you-- oh god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vox Machina."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Little bit of pee comes out. A little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys, he knows our name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You come with purpose. I can sense your determination. What would you tell me of your "purpose?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vecna walks the earth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are here to prevent the coming of a third Calamity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We seek the means to destroy him and all he stands for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He seeks ascension into godhood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And all your children are in danger, and we have begun communing with the gods. I extend slowly the wings and bow my head in deference to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Divergence is threatened. Your guards, your creatures, have some of our proof in their care, at the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That it still exists is dire news. That it exists in the hands of such a slippery, vile mortal as "Vecna, even more so. I thank you for your haste in sharing your findings. I shall ponder a strategy." He leans back in his chair, brushes his hand like this, and the doors behind you (boom) open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have the eye of Vecna.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His form shifts a bit, seems to lean forward on the throne, resting the bright, burning, star-like head on the edge of his gauntleted fist, leaning forward in your direction. You try and glance up, but it hurts in the presence. "Present the artifact."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we gave it to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we still have it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he kept it with us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I have it, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could you guys turn them up? We can't hear them at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you place the box on the ground--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll try to take it over-- I'm going to leave it on the ground; it's a little hot over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's ever-present, but there is definitely a focal point that you can sense when it comes to you, it's like having a spotlight on you amongst a theater of thousands of people. It's intimidating, but also exhilarating. The beacon shifts in the direction of the small box you placed on the ground. Immediately the box flips open, and you watch as the eye levitates out on its own, twitching and looking around in all directions. It has no lid to close, and the tiny slit-like iris of it seems to retract best it can, in the presence of such bright light. You hear this low, ruminating (hums). "Do you have purpose with this?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Only if it can help us destroy Vecna.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you know how this would help you destroy Vecna?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't know how to destroy Vecna.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We seek knowledge and power.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And assistance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could destroy this right now, only if you do not need it. Its existence is a threat. But the "choice is yours, since you brought it before me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know what help it would be to us on the Material Plane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stares through you. The beacon finds you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not the only one in existence. There are others.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it might be, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's his eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are other people missing eyes, but this is the only one--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's his. And it should be destroyed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it'll make him weaker, if it is destroyed. He obviously put it in his scion. We destroy it, we keep someone else like Delilah Briarwood from coming into power. Right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I think...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I say destroy it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delilah was obviously his pawn and she was using it. Fuck it. Destroy it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We stand with... a master of the Grey Hunt. She is the one who can speak for Whitestone on that level. If you say destroy it, we destroy it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The beacon comes back to you again. The stage beneath you, everyone around you, seems to vanish in the light that's the attention of this entity, this god, ancient beyond all thought and reason that you would contemplate, awaiting your answer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know so much more than we do. If you believe it is unsafe, then we trust your wisdom in destroying it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The wisdom of the creators is to instill their creations with the choice of their own "destiny."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I say destroy it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The choice is made." And with that point you watch as, without leaving attention from you, the eye begins to lift up out of the box once more. The hand that was under the chin unfurls into a clasping set of fingers, and as they clench together, you hear the metal clink and grind, and you watch as this light begins to flare around the eye. And if you could hear a squeaking scream from a powerful artifact, you watch as it just burns in a flash. And (shattering noise) the shattering sound echoes throughout the room. You see a burst of greenish dark energy, and for a moment, the light in the room seems to dim, like a very faint, almost brown-out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) Shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that's a good thing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is a good thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vecna's a puppeteer. He used that to move Delilah. It's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, if you have no further business..."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We seek out the goddess Ioun, the goddess of knowledge. The ritual of seeding was lost to time, and we know that the goddess Ioun is one of the only keepers of that knowledge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a moment of contemplation on his end. "She is safe. She recovers, hidden away. I "know elements of where she resides, but this information only belongs to those trusted."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We know you and her helped seal away the chaos of these secrets before. We may need your help doing it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans forward towards you, and you feel the beacon of attention shift towards you this time. And you, Keyleth, who have spent most of your life trying to dodge and dive from the attention of the masses, trying to buck the destiny that has been thrust upon you since childhood, here in this moment, you have the attention of one of the prime creator gods of Exandria, and you feel yourself weaken and strengthen at the same time. You're not sure whether to run or stand, and the voice comes out once more. "I have champions across all of "Exandria who have lived longer and proven themselves worthy, capable. My consecrations are "taxing, and I will not have it wasted on those set to fail."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How can we prove ourselves to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have not one faithful among you, yet you beseech my blessing."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could be your champion. You could teach me to believe. I, arguably, am faithless. I know you all know that. I believe, and I have respect, and I am awe-inspired by all of this. But faith, I still don't know if I have, but I... I believe you could teach me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is there anyone else who would challenge this proclamation?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to challenge you, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? We already have one champion of the Raven Queen. Why not?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once, you blessed Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whitestone is under my watch and keep. It was created through the battlefield in which I "sealed Tharizdun himself. It was the grounds in which Ioun was wounded in the Calamity. There was "much sorrow in those lands. Yes, it is under my watch."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm friends with the Sun Tree. We talk occasionally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A faithless stands to try and accept the champion's mantle. I ask once more, is there any "to challenge this claim?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth... let me? I've never felt this before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are the lady of Whitestone. It suits you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, as the vessel, kneel before me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I kneel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And these two hourglasses now held aloft, gliding slowly above the space where you stand. "Ascend to the zenith. Embrace your faith and throw yourself "in the Fires of Dawn. Should you be strong of heart and your faith be true, the flames will "grant you my blessing."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just me, or the group of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You must jump into the flames. They can help you ascend. However, your trial begins now." And you watch as one of the glasses suddenly shifts, and three of the winged planars appear in the room, armored around you, arms crossed, and they look to be trying to block the passage into the tower as they fly up. You look up to the seemingly endless beacon above you, to the top of the tower that you cannot see at this distance, and you know immediately, somehow, quickly, you have to get there. So. What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I. Hate. Timed. Challenges.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I've got the boots, but I-- okay, I'm going, I take off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Click your Boots of Haste.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to to turn her into a red dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure. I click my Boots of Haste before he does it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you click your Boots of Haste. They come into you, you feel the surge of energy, the rush, the burst of adrenaline through your body, as you begin casting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: True Polymorph.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. Does that ever end? Do you have to cancel it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you begin to ascend, you watch as the three planar begin to rush towards you, their arms out to grasp. Anyone else going to do anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I would like to smash my gauntlets together and cast Enlarge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you go into your larger form now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And rage. I'll charge one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're up in the air. She's flying up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got the carpet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I pull the carpet out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I click my Boots of Spider Climbing and spend an action surge to draw and start taking shots at the wings. I want to drop them out of the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it, make three shots. Very quickly. As you're ascending on the broom as quickly as possible, and they begin to converge on you, you feel this tickle of energy in the back of your mind and you watch as your hands begin to suddenly grow claws and scales, a red color.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax! Do something!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Shield of Faith on my own ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Shield of Faith cast on Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can everybody fly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm running up the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before I Polymorph, I toss you my broom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to allow that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. So you throw the broom off the side, and you begin to plummet immediately through the air. As you're concentrating on the spell to cast it, you finish it off, and you plummet back about half the distance, and then (whoosh) these giant leathery red dragon wings whip out of your form, and you catch yourself. The broom clatters to the ground, and Scanlan marches over and grabs it, manages to get it under his grasp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know that word!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So you begin to ascend upward, right as they begin to descend on your dragon form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20, 24, and 36, they all hit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a strength saving throw, or they fall a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength saving throw, all right, that is an 18?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope. They fall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 12. So two of them. You shoot two of the wings out of the way and they plummet down, and you manage to coast past two of them in your dragon form. One of them does manage to grab onto you and get its hands, big strong hands on the back of your head and try and steer you to the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I cast Frightful Presence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to that in just a moment. It's going to attempt to-- no. It tries to pull against you, but even with its extremely strong planar strength it cannot guide you away from the path, and you push past. You are now outside of the chamber in the base of the tower, just flying upward. You can go ahead and use your Frightful Presence. All right, so that's your action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of the creatures-- no, of my choosing, so all the bad-- not bad guys, but you know, people we're fighting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you roar loudly and it echoes, filling the entirety of the chamber, the music of the surroundings now merging and shifting with this horrible dragon roar. None of these angelic entities seem even remotely affected by it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really? They don't even have to make a wisdom saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are immune to fear. Or being frightened, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That makes sense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But do you continue flying upward? Okay! So you finish your spell, you take your shots, Keyleth, Pike, anything?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I close enough to Grog to hop onto the carpet, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are people clustered up together by now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I take the alignment of the animal that I'm polymorphed into?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not the alignment, just your mental scores.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are people super clustered, or is she now clustered with them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she's above everybody. She's way past all you guys; she shot straight up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So the angel dudes are all clustered together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of them fell a little bit, one of them's on her back. She's making her way up, guys. The first stained glass is starting to run out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah, wait can I do a, with my spear can I do a higher-level Fireball? And just do more charges out of it? Or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say no because you can't spend more charges to increase the level of the spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I will do a 5th-level Flaming Sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the Flaming Sphere slams upward against the side there. Saving throw. Rolls a one on saving throw. So it takes damage. Flaming spear hits it, however--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't hit both of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you can slam it into one creature per turn. The one that's on her back, you mean? What's the range on the flaming sphere?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, the time is running out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No time for a book. Never mind; it doesn't matter. The flaming sphere slams into one of the ones that's not on her back. It's too far out of your range.  All right, so. Who's doing what next?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're rocketing up on the rug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the rug, not very fast, and her speed is much faster as a dragon, so you guys are coming up behind and you're just watching the dragon (flapping).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we close to any of the other two that are at the bottom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but as soon as that timer went out, the chamber's roof above you slams shut. You're all cut off from Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was running up the wall. I didn't make it in time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not at your speed, no. It's a big chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When I clicked my boots, do I still get a hasted action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, cool, then I can go 160 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can. The planar is still holding on to the back of your head, it's going to make another strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to tail whip him. Is that a thing I can do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, I have a red dice, it's so perfect and I never choose this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay, well. What am I adding to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add your strength modifier. If there isn't an athletics score, then whatever your strength modifier is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be plus five?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you talking about hers or the dragon's?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, a plus seven. So 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. The planar grabs one side of your horn and causes you to slam into the side of the tower, and you skid across and smash into one of the stained glass windows which (smash) fires out the side and you end up slowing down a bit and it actually takes you a moment, it halves your speed for this round. You try and get your wings back up. Are you going to do anything about the guy on your back or are you going to keep plugging as fast as you can upwards?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's on my back, or he's like hanging onto me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's on your neck and head. He's holding on and trying to steer you off to the side by controlling your movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to spin and try to slam into the wall and knock him into the stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can she do like a wing thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to use my wings to thrust me faster into the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no. Okay. Athletics check, was a plus seven, so 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make another athletics check. Roll a d20 and add your strength modifier. Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. That one didn't count.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't intend to roll it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Ooh, okay, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you beat him. He tries to pull you off to the side and you begin to skid into it. Your wing hits the side of the tower (scraping noise), but you keep pushing forward. The pain hits you, you end up taking about 25 points of damage, just grinding into this divine golden side but you keep flying up (flapping) the tower gets tighter and tighter and tighter. You now can see as the planar is going to attempt to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, can I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he hanging onto me with one arm now? What is he doing, because I knocked him into the wall, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to just dash. I'm going to fuck him and just dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to go double speed, all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Double speed!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You shoot up. That gives him a full round to go ahead and try and scare you off. Roll again with your strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (crash) Slams you into the wall. You skid and slow down a little bit. You can see it's closing. But you are dashing so you get a second speed run, which does get you up towards where the wall's closing now. You can see now the bright light is getting brighter and brighter. Your eyes are hurting in its presence, you can see a large brazier at the top of the tower that is now in flames, before you. You're not quite there; you have one more round. He's going to go ahead and now turn around, and now the angel turns around on your face. He is going to attempt to punch in your eyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have legendary--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use my legendary resistance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's a physical attack on you. What's your AC?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19. Natural.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it hits you, you take disadvantage on your next strike. Go ahead and roll an athletics check to try and buck him off. One last time, this is the only one you have time for. Disadvantage because he punched you in the face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, all right, you're slowing down, you're slowing down, you're not quite getting there, he's bashing you in the face--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take my claws up and rake him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make another strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it, 18!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11! You thrust him off your face! As he falls off down below, (flapping) you make it up to the top, and you now see the brazier is about the size of your dragon form. It's physically your size and you can see now the tower's beginning to close around you, what are you going to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to reach the tower thing and push myself up through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look down into the brazier, the fire there burning is ever-present light--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rush into the fire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no sense of time, place, and for the first time in a long time, you don't remember your name. For a brief instant, you think, what bit of conscious thought you can make, is this is what oblivion feels like? Did you make the right choice? Were you led astray? Were you strong of heart enough? The flames were intended to cleanse away sin, darkness, possibly those who are unworthy. Is this it now? Did you fail? You guys down below watch as the chamber doors that closed off above you (scraping noise) open up again to reveal the tower. And you can see there, suspended in the middle of the air, thousands of shards of stained glass that had shattered inwards from the impact but frozen, held in place. As they all slowly retract back, reforming the windows that were once there. Whatever impact or shock wave had scattered them below reversed and repaired. And you watch as they do so, ascending, until the tower's back untouched as it was. The one planar that had ridden the dragon form of Vex towards the top of the tower slowly descends (flapping) and lands next to the three others. And they all give a nod towards the Dawnfather, who's still there, not looking upward, just looking at the rest of the remaining members of Vox Machina, his beacon of attention just shifting from one to the other. The three planars leave the still-open doors. "What does she mean to you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To us? Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To you, all of you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I told you that I was faithless, which might be true when it comes to the gods, but not with Vex'ahlia, not with Vox Machina. She gives me my power.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Her name is Vex, and she is greedy and mean sometimes, and she can steal a lot. She's a little bit not the greatest person, but her flaws highlight everything that is right about her, which is she does all these things to protect her friends and her family. She would give her life for any of us and for anyone who was truly in need. And she's not perfect, but she's the most perfect of all of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I believe in her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The beacon shifts to you, Pike.

lines.name: PIKE
lines.text: I don't have a real sister, but I consider her more of my sister than I've ever had. She's family, and if you take her from me, there will be hell to pay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The beacon shifts to Percival.

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: She is Mistress of the Grey Hunt of Whitestone, Baroness of the First House of Whitestone. She is my heart and my judgment and the future that I have chosen, and she is the one that I have betrothed to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Betrothed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The beacon shifts back to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She is your champion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping and cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit, Super Saiyan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did I get? What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You naturally have resistance to necrotic damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good for me. That fucking Finger of Death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And if you want to read the rest of that, you can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As a bonus action, you channel the light of day into your being. For one hour you admit, emit-- fuck me running, you emit bright light in a 120-foot radius, and any evil creature within that 120-foot radius that hits you with an attack or spell immediately suffers 4d6 radiant damage and is knocked prone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow! You're a walking nuke!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shine bright like a diamond.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Once this blessing ability is used, it can't be used again for seven days.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy moly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Blessings of the gods!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll have to add a sixth star to the de Rolo crest. Fucking excited.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you for allowing me to represent you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Having brought it low in battle, Ioun had devised "something she called the Prime Trammel."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Prime Trammel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Guided by a sizable sliver of a god's power, one such device could be formed, and when "enough are affixed to a wounded god, seal them away in a plane beyond the Astral Sea. Such a "method could perhaps force a new god back through the Divine Gate and beyond the reach of your "world. Ioun, however, the one who has the design for such an artifact-- she has been in hiding "since her wounding. She heals still, the wounded god, and has feared for the past eight centuries "that her enemies seek to finish the job. We communicate on occasion through missives and "emissaries. All that I know is the key to her hidden realm is within someone. The last word from "the mistress from nearly a century before granted me this." The gauntleted hand extends and opens, and there you see, apparating in the space above, what appears to be a three-dimensional topographical map of some kind. It slowly rotates, made of pure sunlight and flame. It's a mountain range with a glowing light within a small, hidden house or hovel within a forest. Make an investigation check. I would say Keyleth, Vex'ahlia, Vax'ildan, and Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good, thank god. Because mine sucked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also a natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a real good map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. What did you get, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Glancing at it, both of you recognize, as it pulls back and shifts inward, this is deep within the Cliffkeep. This is far north of Kraghammer. This is in a forested region outside the Pools of Wittebak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pools of Wittebak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as it releases from the gauntleted fingers-- so massive, each finger is as thick as your torso, it plops into your palm, and the glow fades, and there before you, you see what looks to be some sort of an oval-like opal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love opals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, I have invested what I can safely do within you. Go. Be swift. Find this key. Strike "soon. Destroy or seal this great evil and prove my faith in you is not misplaced, Vex'ahlia."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It won't be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The doors behind you that are already partially ajar (rumble) open up all the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'll put this in a really safe pocket, then. There's one that's got an extra snap. Triple snap and then a zipper over it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just don't let it fall in the toilet when you go over to flush.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out the little pebble and I drop it on the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach for the pebble. It's not there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit. Is there a hole in it? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No hole. Sarenrae was not going to teleport you across the realm, letting you take away one of the prized souls of her people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, those were the souls!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was the pope, Travis. That was the pope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should've swallowed the rock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we're going to end tonight's session.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. What the fuck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Champions over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) We are the champions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is so fun. I haven't been able to do epic-level content! That's so fun!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is every episode going to be this emotional for the rest of the game? I can't keep doing this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Liam, what did you say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I said the twins are officially salt and pepper shakers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You totally are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, and I have the white--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have the white dragon scale armor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's actually pretty great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think this actually changes the crest of Whitestone now, because now there's a sixth champion of Pelor who's of Whitestone. Six stars, not five now. Holy cow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man. You should really not change that crest, because it's in the campaign guide that's being published in two months.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would only be hers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there we go. I feel better about that now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would only be her house crest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know, it's okay, because the book technically takes place before all of this. There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, I also have to throw out. We on Skype now get the full Twitch view, so I'm seeing you guys with all your icons, with everything, and it is the weirdest amalgamation of Baldur's Gate and Sega's full-motion video game from 1995 Night Trap starring Different Strokes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all I've wanted. All I've ever wanted as a creative was to develop, design, and produce what I would consider to be today's Night Trap for you all. If we could achieve that, I've done my job.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Liam, we miss you! Ashley, we miss you!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, I miss you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for staying up late with us. We really appreciate it, guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love you, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're god hunting without you guys. It's weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need our east coasters.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Man, to think I almost didn't Skype in tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know! I'm glad you could.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll give all my cows a hug for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, guys. Our tickets for the live show at Gen Con go up tomorrow morning. Look for that. Hopefully see you guys there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's in an even bigger theater. We had an amazing time last time, and this theater is even larger, and will be mad, mad crazy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Live, in person. Find out how tall Travis really is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four foot three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all teeny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, thank you guys so much. Rest well, especially you east coasters, and you east coasters, and you other country-ers. Have a wonderful night. Sleep well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you Marvel Puzzle Quest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you Marvel Puzzle Quest for being our awesome sponsor!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And check out the podcast!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check out the podcast, which is awesome. And is it Thursday yet? Good night, guys! [music]
